item.title: Build Hello Recruitment
item.description: Welcome to Build Hello Recruitment We’re currently in a start-up stage. That means we’re ‘picking teams,’ so to speak. Our Process The process we follow as a start-up, and the process you may want to follow, as a potential Build Hello partner or employee, is similar to the processes professional sports teams follow.

item.title: Build Hello Orientation Videos
